name: The Eye of Judgment Legends
description:
Place your digital game cards on the board and let the combat begin in this fun, addictive and accessible trading card game anyone can enjoy.

Features:
• PSP® system exclusive Story Mode – New Single Player mode unfolds an epic story through each battle
• 300+ Cards to Collect – Earn digital cards by playing through the game, trade them via Ad Hoc mode, or win cards through duels against others online
• Multi-Player Modes – Battle another player one-on-one in Ad Hoc or Infrastructure Modes, and test your scores against global online rankings

PS3™ system owners can collect the physical version of some of these cards in The Eye of Judgment™ game (sold separately). Compatible with the PlayStation®Eye, the next-generation USB camera for the PS3™ system, this version is a groundbreaking experience!

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item’s use restrictions and other terms and conditions located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.

THE EYE OF JUDGMENT is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. © 2010 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
